title: New River Gorge National River: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News              New River Gorge National River strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur within the park by providing press releases to local and regional news providers, and by posting current news releases on this web site. If you are a member of the media, please contact our Public Affairs Office for additional information.           For current information and park updates, check out our facebook page or follow us on twitter: www.facebook.com/newrivergorgenps https://Twitter.com/NewRiverNPS
